mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TESTLIB.BOOKMST (title,BOOK_CD,b_group,publish,author,rentchk,imageurl, rcv_date, isbn, price, summary) VALUES (#{title},#{book_cd},#{b_group},#{publish},#{author},'0', #{imageurl}, current date, #{isbn}, #{price}, #{summary})
mapper.select: SELECT A.title, A.author, A.publish, A.b_group, A.rentchk, A.reservechk, A.book_cd, B.returndate FROM TESTLIB.BOOKMST A LEFT OUTER JOIN testlib.bookrent B ON A.book_cd = B.book_cd AND A.rentchk = B.rentchk WHERE A.TITLE like #{keyword} ORDER BY A.RENTCHK DESC, A.RCV_DATE DESC
SELECT title, author, b_group, rentchk, reservechk, book_cd FROM TESTLIB.BOOKMST ORDER BY RENTCHK DESC
SELECT * FROM TESTLIB.BOOKMST ORDER BY rcv_date DESC FETCH first 5 rows only
SELECT B.team_nm, COUNT(*) AS count FROM testlib.bookrent A INNER JOIN tprlib.gr_insa B ON A.id=B.asabn WHERE rentdate > current date - 4 month GROUP BY B.team_nm ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT A.id, A.book_cd, COUNT(*) AS count, (SELECT title FROM testlib.bookmst WHERE book_cd = A.book_cd) AS title, (SELECT author FROM testlib.bookmst WHERE book_cd = A.book_cd) AS author FROM testlib.bookrent A INNER JOIN tprlib.gr_insa B ON A.id = B.asabn WHERE A.rentdate > current date - 6 month GROUP BY A.id, A.book_cd ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS count, B.book_cd, (SELECT title FROM testlib.bookmst WHERE book_cd = B.book_cd) AS title, (SELECT author FROM testlib.bookmst WHERE book_cd = B.book_cd) AS author FROM testlib.bookrent A INNER JOIN testlib.bookmst B ON A.book_cd = B.book_cd GROUP BY B.book_cd ORDER BY count DESC FETCH first 5 rows only
